ref.mixed-citation: Duxbury, R. E. and Sadun, E. H., 1970, Immunization against African trypanosomiasis by gamma radiation, isotopes and radiation in parasitology 2: Proceedings of the Research Co-ordination Meeting on the Use of Isotopes and Radiation in Studies of Parasitic Diseases in Domestic Animals, Vienna, Austria, 2–6 June 1969. pp. 83–95.
